data.title: Games like Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ • Games similar to Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ • RAWG
data.meta_description: Games similar to Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ on RAWG ✔ Video game discovery site ✔ The most comprehensive database that is powered by personal player...
data.text:
Shadow of Rome is an action game developed by Capcom Production Studio 2. It was originally released in 2005. Capcom published the game. Shadow of Rome has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. You can play Shadow of Rome on PlayStation 2. It was produced by Yoshinori Ono. It was directed by Motohide Eshiro. Yoshino Aoki scored the game.

Action News Heroes is a game. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Krewe Studios. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. Action News Heroes is available on Xbox One. You can purchase the game on Xbox Store.

Generations Lost is an action game developed by Pacific Softscape. It was originally released in 1994. It was published by Atari. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Generations Lost on Genesis.

Spyro 2: Season of Flame is a game developed by Digital Eclipse and Backbone Entertainment. It was originally released in 2002. Vivendi Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Spyro 2: Season of Flame on Game Boy Advance. Ed Cosico and Robert Baffy scored the game.

Izuna: Legend of the Unemployed Ninja is a game developed by Ninja Studio. It came out on 20-02-2007. Atlus published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Izuna: Legend of the Unemployed Ninja is available on Nintendo DS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop.

Disney's Lilo & Stitch (2002) is an action-platformer game developed by Digital Eclipse. It was originally released in 2002. UniSoft Games published the game. Disney's Lilo & Stitch (2002) has a Metascore of 80, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Disney's Lilo & Stitch (2002) is available on Game Boy Advance.

Dokapon: Monster Hunter is an action-RPG game developed by Asmik Ace Entertainment. It was originally released in 2001. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". You can play Dokapon: Monster Hunter on Game Boy Advance.

Spider-Man: Mysterio's Menace is an action game developed by Vicarious Visions. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Spider-Man: Mysterio's Menace on Game Boy Advance.

Overlord: Minions is an adventure game developed by Climax Studios. It came out on 23-06-2009. Codemasters published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Overlord: Minions has a score of 58. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip". Overlord: Minions is available on Nintendo DS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop. Allister Brimble scored the game.

Pinball FX is a simulation-sports game developed by Zen Studios. It came out on 26-01-2010. It was published by Microsoft Studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". Pinball FX is available on PC, Nintendo Switch and Xbox 360. The game is sold via Steam, Epic Games Store and Xbox 360 Store.

Boku no Natsuyasumi 4: Seitouchi Shounen Tanteidan, Boku to Himitsu no Chizu is an action game developed by Millennium Kitchen. It was originally released in 2005. SCEI published the game. Boku no Natsuyasumi 4: Seitouchi Shounen Tanteidan, Boku to Himitsu no Chizu is available on PSP.
